text: Toto khukhuloonga likulu nende eshialo nende okhubotokhana kweshilo nende eshitere, nende amaaro kachendanga khunyanza, khukhukhoonya Abandu, nende amaatsi ka Nyasaye yeshinjia okhurula hekulu, mana nalamusia liloba okhurula mukhufwa khwalio, mana nasalasiamwo buli imbia yetsisolo, nende okhukalukhana khwomuyeka	nende	amaleesi kalomesibungwa okhubura hakari weshialo nende likulu khulimwo nende eshilolelo khubandu baparanga
